detail_desc: Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey with a high waist, lined gusset, high-cut legs and half-string back.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in woven fabric with a collar and a V-neck opening with a concealed button at the front. Seam at the waist and a belt with metal D-rings. Unlined.
Chokers in various styles. Adjustable length, approx. 30-37.5 cm.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with wide, wrapover elastication at the waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Scarf in soft, fine knit with a brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides. Size 65x180 cm.
Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.
Long-sleeved jersey tops in a soft cotton blend. Slim fit.

Push-up bra in lace and mesh with decorative, crossover straps at the front and underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer at the back with a gently rounded hem.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with hard-worn details and no buttons.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with lining fabric at the back. Buttons at the front, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an adjustable tab at the back. Lined.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and raw-edge hems.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.
Blouse in a softly draping, patterned weave with frills, a V-neck and covered buttons down the front. Seam with a gently flared peplum and long sleeves with smocking and frills at the cuffs.
Fully lined, patterned bikini top with an elasticated hem.
Knee-length shorts in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Set with leggings and socks in soft, fine-knit cotton. Leggings in a textured knit with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a decorative lace trim and bow at the top, narrow shoulder straps, elastication around the hems and press-studs at the crotch.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, lapped ribbing at the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from cotton and silk.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Scarf in an airy weave with fringes along the sides.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Wide tunic in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a small stand-up collar, buttons at the top, a double-layered yoke and gathered seams at the shoulders and back of the neck. Gently dropped shoulders, long, voluminous sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a seam at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Push-up body in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey.

Strapless balconette bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a double-layered hood, gently dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Pyjama bottoms in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Top in sturdy, stretch fabric with a sweetheart neckline. Concealed elastication over the shoulders, short puff sleeves and a straight hem.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Sleeveless jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a flounce around the neckline and one shoulder and a narrow strap with a decorative tie detail on the other shoulder. Elasticated seam at the waist and pockets in the side seams.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Double-breasted coat in sturdy fabric with a collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and concealed side pockets. Lined.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and skinny legs. Skinny fit.

Calf-length dress in a soft, organic cotton and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a deep V-neck and buttons down the front. Double flounces down the front that go over the shoulders and continue down the back, short puff sleeves and a seam at the waist. Lined skirt.
Long-sleeved bolero in a fine, fluffy knit with a button at the neck.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Non-wired, lace push-up bra with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Baby Exclusive. Dungaree shorts woven in an organic cotton blend containing some linen. Straps with adjustable fasteners, a chest pocket and buttons at the sides. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front, drawstring at the waist and a single back vent. Handwarmer pockets at the top and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Quilted lining.
Waist-high hipster briefs in lace and mesh with a lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
V-neck slipover in a soft cable knit with ribbing around the neckline and hem. Relaxed fit.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a double layer at the top and slits in the sides of the hem.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Push-up bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Small opening at the front, a wide trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Leggings in washed, patterned stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.

Sandals in imitation leather with a lightly padded top edge and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Wide strap over the foot with shimmering appliqués and an adjustable hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Imitation suede cap with an adjustable fastener at the back. Mesh lining.

Long, V-neck tunic in striped cotton poplin with buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Suede sandals with covered block heels, open toes and a narrow, adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in soft organic cotton slub jersey with decorative buttons at the front, an elasticated waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Sports top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, zip at the top, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Relaxed-fit jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Blouse in a crinkled cotton weave with a unique nursing feature. Round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Rugby shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Fitted dress in sturdy cotton jersey with a round, trimmed neckline and short puff sleeves. Unlined.

Blouse in a cool cotton weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with a sleeve placket and close-fitting buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Short, sleeveless dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a tie detail and small opening at the front. Concealed zip in one side, and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying sweatshirt fabric with a wide covered elastic waistband, drawstring at the waist and diagonal side pockets.
Corduroy jacket with a pile collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and buttoned cuffs. Pile lining.

Super push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, moulded, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and silicon trim at the back to hold the bra in place. Wide fastening at the back with hooks and eyes.
Bell-shaped skirt in cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist and press-studs down the front. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
